value.0: **The merchant is still pacing but it seems hes on to a diferent problem that needs solving**
**The merchant is still pacing back and forth muttering**
What?!  Damnation the hells am I going to do now?  Give it to me.
Haha!  Thank the Gods thank the Gods! ... Oh ... right right ... **Produces a pouch after a time and hands it to you smiling*  Well at least that problems solved.
**The merchant is pacing back and forth talking to himself about something being imposible and or theres no way Im doing that**
No as a matter of fact Im not.

I have this damned agreement I need to get signed and sealed thats what the problem is! **Holds up a peice of parchment**  And Ill be damned if im going back to that cursed island.  The hells they give this to me again ... I was lucky to get out alive last time ... *Starts to trail off muttering about savages*
You know ... you know ... hmm **Looks you over** I dont suppose youd be willing to get it signed and sealed and bring it back would you?  Id pay you for your time of course ...
Well I dont know 75 gold peices?
Just go to Hammerstaad on the Island of Norheim.  Get the king there to sign this agreement and put his seal on it then bring it back to me.
I have no idea.  Try asking the harbor master he might know.
Just go to Hammerstaad on the Island of Norheim.  Get the king there to sign this agreement and put his seal on it then bring it back to me.  Ill pay you 75 gold when you come back.
I have no idea.  Try asking the harbor master he might know.
The crazy bastard tore it up!
Your crazier than I thought you were.
Alright.  What do I have to do?
Sure why not.  What do I have to do?
